details.n: Problem Children Are Coming from Another World, Aren't They?

ratings.en: OVA The Hot Spring Fun Trip
Mondaijii-tachi ga omatsurisawagi ni sanka suru yô desu yo?
Chikai wa hoshi no kanata ni da sô desu yo?
Kuro Usagi ga eroiyarashii yatsu ni nerawareta yô desu yo?
Ofuro de anna koto ya konna koto da sô desu yo?
Wasô rori wa iroiro buttonda okata no yô desu yo?
Mondaiji-tachi ga hakoniwa ni yattekita yô desu yo?
It Seems That the Problem Children Prove Who's on Top?
Kuroi kyouji wa fue no oto totomoni kuru sô desu yo?
Kurayami de Asuka ga chûchû sorechau sô desu yo?
